text: fastjab allah dea'ha waqabl minha nadhrha 'ahsan qabwl, wtwlla aibnatiha maryam balreayt fanbtha nbatana hsnana, wyssar allah laha zakariaa ealayh alslam kafla fasknha fi makan ebadth, wakan kllama dakhal ealayha hdha almakan wajad eindaha rzqana hnyyana meddaan qal: ya maryam min 'ayn lk hdha alrizq altyb? qalt: hu rizq min eind allh. 'iina allah -bfdlh- yarzuq man yasha' min khalaqah bighayr hsab
